text:
Inquisitive , hard working and person with Never-say-die attitude 
MSE main gine chune hi acche dost bane and you are one of them kyunki humari vibe humesha match hui. Kuch bhi nya karna ke lie tu humesha ready tha. DC courses padhte nahi the par pata nahi kaise A lag jaata tha :P. Class main fb games aur life ke baare main discuss karne hi to jaate the :XD.
2nd year end ke PSO,ESC201  ke endsem ki party abhi bhi baaki hain :P
Aur ha bhai ab delhi exclusively tujse hi milne aana hoga :) aur photo bhi le lenge yaar. Last time mile tabhi bhul gaye. Btw tu kya campus se nikala dosa ne sabko hi nikal dia :XD
P.S. Typical Noisy neighbour jo europa jite wahi baadi baat ho jaegi :P
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Cheers to our late night bulla sessions and wing cricket matches. First and second year jitni bakchodi shayad hi kabhi life main ho paegi. You have also been my library partner ( Wo alag baat hain ki ginke 4 baar gaye hain poore 4 saal main :P )
Be the same hardworking cheerful person you have been. Delhi jaise ek aur trip karni hain !!
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
From " It is my earnest request " to getting likes on the selfie contest to teaching almost everything to the entire wing to those Antaragni nights to the constant crazy party companion, we have come a long way. Be the same "know it all" guy who is always ready for new adventures. 
MI >> samsung and Kanpur city hain :P
Stay in touch brother!!
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
To the batchmate who turned into best friend <3
To the person who I barely spoke to even though we were sitting right next right to each other for an entire semester , who went on to  become someone with whom I started sharing each and everything that happened in my life. ( How did I from this to this waali reel bna sakte ispe :XD)
To someone whom saying goodbye while leaving the campus made me emotional <3.
I guess we have a lot of common interests be it love for Office or you know who ;P
Those late night zoom calls discussing random things or playing games was so much fun.Maybe this friendship was something good that came out of Covid time. 
"I had always considered myself to be a good person but after this incident, Iâ€™m not sure about that anymore" - Ananya . Let people guess how bad this incident can be :P
Thanks for making me understand the difference between tipsy and bhand and for showing me the parts of campus which I would have never visited otherwise. 
3rd April was indeed fun and memorable ( afterall a theory was being proved :P).
â€œForeverâ€ wala dance is still on the cards bas Jim aur Pam ko ishara karna hain <3
I hope we continue this in the next walk of life where friendship never ends.
We will meet very soon par gaadi chala ke tu mat aana :P
From one proud member of Perfectenschlag to another <3 ( brownie points if you remember why the group was originally formed :P)
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
It was because of you I became part of Techkriti core team and now it has became an important part of my college life. Thanks you bhai for convincing me ki Head Web ban jaa and not Manager :P. 
We should thank Covid or lockdown for making our friendship stronger. Will miss those late night pubg sessions if there is lockdown 2.0.
Wing group ka enthu yuhi bnae rakhna aur jald hi milte Bengaluru main!!!
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Hey Monika!! We haven't interacted much in campus apart from the hackathon which we eventually didn't participate :P. Hope so ki humare paths intersect ho kabhi future main!!
Keep flexing those cool yoga postures :)
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Yo Ashu bhai!!
IITK ka first half wouldnâ€™t be complete without mentioning you. And I can write this on behalf of the entire C6 wing. First year main tere room pe kitne maze kie yaar aur tab tu mna bhi nahi karta tha. Chahe bulla kaatna ho ya forward assault, loco ho ya zupee,game aur purpose badalte gaye par location wahi ki wahi. First year summer main poori raat pubg khelna aur wahi so jaana kyunki cooler bas tere paas tha :p. First year main courses saath main padhna aur library NCL jaana just iss lie ki log jaa rahe the :P. Remember the pattern that we observed : Agar exam se ek raat pehle maine tuje padhaya ya tu mere room main aaya to mere marks kam aate the :XD. 
I hope ki maine tuje jo bhi secrets btae hain wo kabhi bahar na aae :P
 Aakhiri aakhiri main tu â€œ daredevil cupid stuntsâ€ karne main busy tha iss lie itni baat nahi ho paayi. Par hope so ki Goa jaise aur trip ho ( iss baar tuje couch pe nahi sona padega). Stay in touch bhai ( not like the last year but as we use to do in first and second year)
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Yo Avani!! 
Most of our talks should have been about Techkriti but surprisingly itâ€™s on bitching about someone or planning parties or trips that never happened. And the one which did happen was unplanned. Well We even enjoyed that party until you left :P.
Singing ka to pata tha par never knew ki you even dance well 
Btw mile to ART105 ke through the par uss time ke Anuj ko to main hi yaad nahi karna chahta :P
Jald hi agli trip plan karte hain hoping ki iss baar plan execute ho jae :XD
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Devendra bhai!!
Baaju waali wing ka hone ke bawajood apni meaningful interaction Techkriti ke though start hua. Massive respect for the hard work and the dedication you put in any work that you take !!
Shivji ke dhwar tak le jaane ke lie shukriya :P Fest hota to alag hi maze aate par still I feel ki Techkriti team ke saath judna was one of the best decision I took in my College life.
Jald hi sab log fir milte hain aur iss baar apan photo bhi le lenge :P
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
College me ate hi apan ko "bhai" bana diya but apan ne usko literally le liya <3
MSE201 ke past year papers share karne se lekaar Chandler banne tak ki journey pata hi nahi chala kaise nikal gayi.
Chaar dewaar ke bahaar ki duniya dikhane ke lie dhanyawaad <3. I will be forever indebted to you for this.( Bahut bhaari word use ho gaya par chill hain :P)
Lucky to hear some random theories devised by you and witnessing one become true <3. 
Dance video banana abhi bhi bach rha hain, jald hi milte hain. Vaise bhi Gujarat to ab aana jaana lga rahega ;P
From one proud member of Perfectenschlag to another ( brownie points if you remember why the group was originally formed :P)
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Yo Raghav bhai!! 
Tere lie memoir likhna is going to be tough kyunki itni memories hai apni ki yahan saari likh hi nahi sakte.
You were the first person I met on campus and bro uske baad C608 main kya kuch nahi kia apan ne. I am a single child so kabhi bhai ka experience nahi tha par tune bilkul bhai ki tarah treat kia. Ladte bhi the par agar koi bahar ka kuch keh de to unse ladne bhi pehle tu hi jaata tha <3. 
Second year main F213 main kitne maze kie the bhai. Wo Shraddha kapoor waala yaad hain ;P. Aur tere wo lessons jo tune hum sabko die the , â€œHow to get a date 101â€ naamse podcast nikal de kya :XD. TT main kitna pro ho gaya tha bhai tu. I really appreciate ki kaise tu jo cheez uthata hain usme pro ho jaata hain ranging from building muscles to playing guitar to some random course to cryptocurrency.
Goa trip was so memorable just because of you ( not literally but thanks for taking that bold move). Aage aur bhi aise trips karenge.
Tu dil ka bahut accha aadmi hain yaar aur bahut emotional bhi. Zindagi main kuch bhi share karna ho to  you know who to call.
P.S. â€œAbey padhai likhai main dhyaan lgao IAS YAS bano.. Lekin nahi â€¦â€
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Yo the king of Dehri-on-Sone!!
One of those people who will party with you till 4 AM until you sleep and then go to his room and study :P. I really appreciate and wonder how well you manage work and life. 
Tu kitna bhaav khata hain yaar :P. Almost saari trips pe tu aaya hai be it Blue world, lucknow, kanpur city trip or Goa ( Saari trip main sabse last â€œHaaâ€ teri aati thi :XD). 
Humne kitne games saath main seekhi hai yaar and usme pro hue hain fir :P ( Loco, TT, Pubg, 28, Poker , Mafia ,Sweep ( ;P), pattamaar :XD ). Forever grateful for introducing me to Office and Football. Agli trip Camp Nou ki kare ?
Yeh cheerful company bangalore main bhi continue rakhna yaar. Touch main to rahengi hi!!
P.S. 3rd year room allocation ke time maza aaya tha :P.
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Yo Raju!!
The only person jiske saath I had a fight ( jisme bc muje to maarne ka mauka hi nahi dia :XD). But bhai uske baad bhi apni friendship bani rahi and that is something commendable. First year ki antaragni ko kya memorable bna dia tha tune. 2-3 logo se to form bhara hi lie the :P.
Humesha haste rehna waala chehre ke karan campus main to dikkat aai tuje (;p) par isko change mat hone dio. Bangalore saath hi jaa rahe to touch main to rahenge hi. Crorepati to tu tha hi aur ab aur aane waala hain dahej main to humara bhi khyal rakhna :XD
P.S. Moonwalk sikhane ke dhanyawaad. Dance moves hain tere paas usko club main use bhi karte jald hi ;P
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Yo beteee!! First year se fourth year tak tu vaisa ka vaisa hi hain. ART105 main apan dono hi the jo fraud maarte the :P. First year summer main Ashu ke room pe raat bhar pubg khelna was the best summer spent on campus. Bhai wo new year party main humne itna kya enjoy ka lia ki poora saal hi ghar pe beetana pada :(
Stay the same â€œliving in the moment and enjoying it to the fullestâ€. 
Hope you get a girl soon so that teri launde waali fetish khatam ho ;P
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
From being roommates in the first year ( CS ki meherbaani) to sharing the room in final year ( Garmiii :P) we have come a long way. One of the very few people jisse campus main roz mila hun. Be it pitching a startup idea in second year or actually working on a startup in 4th  you have been a constant throughout the IITK journey. To many more magical moments ðŸ»ðŸ»
IITK Dominoâ€™s waalo se to blacklist ho gya hain so ab Mumbai jaake aise harkataein mat karna :P
Goa trip was the best par pact yaad hain na tuje :XD, wo execute karna hain ab kyunki uske jo main requirement thi wo fulfill ho chuki hain. Proper waala bhaand tabhi honge. 
Maybe I am not telling it so often, but I value our friendship. Thanks for always being there.
P.S.  Charger sahi kaam kar rha kya :P
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
"Aur bhaiiii" Party kab de rha? :XD
NYO main fraud to mara tha par humne tune nahi :P
One of the most hard working person I met on campus who always has a smile on his face!!
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah

text:
Yogi bhai!!
Odyssey main tere standup se fan hoga tha main. And still I admire tu kitna effortlessly poora mahaul set kar deta hain. H12PL teri commentary ke karan hi yaad rahegi.
Wo lockdown mai ki gayi video call yaad hain :P Probably the only person on campus jiske lie dusre IIT ke confession page pe kisi non IITian ne likha ho :XD
Humesha aise hi haste aur hasate raho. Stay connected bhai
author: Anuj Mayurkumar Shah
